page.title: 13Organisations for Children
page.content: {Brownies} This is held on Monday nights between 6.00 and 7.30.In the summer if it is fine go to the School field but usually it is held at Bentley School.The Sixes iPack are called Elves,Gnomes and Pixies.At the meetings we play games ,make things and work for badges. {Playgroup} This is held every Monday,Wednesday and Friday morning.It is for children who are not yet at school and children come from Tattingstone as well as Bentley. They learn to play together and make things.There is a paid leader and parent helpers.Every year they organise a Strawberry tea and a Coffee Morning and a bonfire party to raise funds for play equipment
